General.Name: National Gypsum Company
General.Description: National Gypsum Company engages in the manufacture and sale of gypsum and its derivatives in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Prince Muhammad Bin Abdulaziz Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11411

1.Name: Mr. Abdulrahman Ibrahim Abdulrahman Al Modaimigh
1.Title: Member of Management Board
